title: How to Kill the Chainsaw Guys in Resident Evil 4

steps.headline: Take out your shotgun.
steps.description:
If you don't have one, you can get it in the building next to the tower in the first village you encounter. Go upstairs and it will be on the wall in a frame. {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/9\/97\/Kill-the-Chainsaw-Guys-in-Resident-Evil-4-Step-1Bullet1.jpg\/v4-460px-Kill-the-Chainsaw-Guys-in-Resident-Evil-4-Step-1Bullet1.jpg","bigUrl":"\/images\/thumb\/9\/97\/Kill-the-Chainsaw-Guys-in-Resident-Evil-4-Step-1Bullet1.jpg\/aid584409-v4-728px-Kill-the-Chainsaw-Guys-in-Resident-Evil-4-Step-1Bullet1.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":"728","bigHeight":"546","licensing":"

License: Creative Commons<\/a>
\n<\/p>


\n<\/p><\/div>"}

steps.headline: Shoot him in its head.
steps.description: He has a waste bag wrapped around his head.

steps.headline: Watch as he lies down after two hits on the head.
steps.description: In the mean time, kill the other villagers behind him. When he is back on his feet, shoot again in the head. He will drop down again. After a few attempts at this, he will die.

steps.headline: Wait for a ruby jewel to appear after you kill him.
steps.description: Pick it up, as it is worth 10,000 pesetas.

text:
Take out your shotgun. If you don't have one, you can get it in the building next to the tower in the first village you encounter. Go upstairs and it will be on the wall in a frame. {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/9\/97\/Kill-the-Chainsaw-Guys-in-Resident-Evil-4-Step-1Bullet1.jpg\/v4-460px-Kill-the-Chainsaw-Guys-in-Resident-Evil-4-Step-1Bullet1.jpg","bigUrl":"\/images\/thumb\/9\/97\/Kill-the-Chainsaw-Guys-in-Resident-Evil-4-Step-1Bullet1.jpg\/aid584409-v4-728px-Kill-the-Chainsaw-Guys-in-Resident-Evil-4-Step-1Bullet1.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":"728","bigHeight":"546","licensing":"

\n<\/p>


\n<\/p><\/div>"} Shoot him in its head. He has a waste bag wrapped around his head. Watch as he lies down after two hits on the head. In the mean time, kill the other villagers behind him. When he is back on his feet, shoot again in the head. He will drop down again. After a few attempts at this, he will die. Wait for a ruby jewel to appear after you kill him. Pick it up, as it is worth 10,000 pesetas.
